body: Laritza's Laws says that "the fact that justice depends on politics "assures them [leaders] political immunity, both for themselves and their clique."
original_body: Laritza's Laws says that "the fact that justice depends on politics "assures them [leaders] political immunity, both for themselves and their clique."
title: Cuba: Who Does The Law Protect?
